headline.main: Negro Soldiers Defended; Their Adaptability as Combat Troops Upheld by Aide to War Secretary

lead_paragraph: TO THE EDITOR OF THE NEW YORK TIMES: In the THE NEW YORK TIMES of Sept. 29 there appears an article by Hanson W. Baldwin under the caption "War Games Show Army Still Lags." The article speaks of Negro troops as a "big and dangerous exception to the general high standard of the American soldier."
